sense.def:
To trust someone
pomeni verjeti, da je nekdo pošten in nam ne bo namerno naredil nič slabega.

seg.quote: Adam could feel his father's trust in him.

sense.def:
To trust someone to do something
pomeni verjeti, da bo nekdo nekaj res naredil.

seg.quote: She didn't trust anyone to look after her child properly.

sense.def:
To trust someone with something
pomeni dovoliti nekomu, da nekaj naredi ali za nekaj poskrbi.

seg.quote: Next year I hope the company will trust me with a bigger budget.

sense.def:
Not to trust something
pomeni, da imamo občutek, da nekaj ni varno ali zanesljivo.

seg.quote: I don't trust fancy gimmicks in cars.
He wanted to get up and walk, but he didn't trust his legs.

sense.def:
To trust one's judgement or advice
pomeni verjeti, da je presoja ali nasvet nekoga dober ali pravilen.

seg.quote: She seems to trust his advice.

sense.def:
To trust that something is true
pomeni upati in pričakovati, da je nekaj res;

seg.quote: They will give you a good pension, I trust?

sense.def:
Trust
je tudi odgovornost, ki nam jo nekdo naloži za pomembne, veliko vredne ali skrivne zadeve.

seg.quote: The judge took the view that to betray a position of trust in such a manner was disgraceful.

sense.def:
A trust
je tudi oblika finančnega poslovanja, pri kateri neka organizacija upravlja s finančnimi sredstvi za nekoga in jih vlaga v različne naložbe.
